result.adr_address: Chervonoi Kalyny Ave, 6, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02217
result.name: Smile Karaoke & ArtBar

reviews.text:
It's just SHOCK.
Initially, we found out what 100 UAH was paid for in order to sing. They clarified whether there will be songs. We were assured that if the song was not there, they would find it on YouTube.
But of course, 80% of the songs are missing, and they won‚Äôt look for them (100 UAH, of course, they took it right away). So for understanding, only a small part of popular songs that are not: All Alegrova, Monatik and so on...
Not working microphones. Strange arrangement of the audio system in the hall (one speaker). Honestly speaking, the impression is that the ‚Äúequipment‚Äù (speaker + 2 broken microphones) was taken from OLH, with the note that I will give it away for free.

Menu.
TOP popular positions are missing. If you're driving, sorry, just a minivan. Fortunately, they agreed to make a mixture of Sprite and syrup for the price of a Mojito.
The most expensive item on the menu, a set for a company. We have never seen anything like this before. There are not enough words to describe how deplorable this plate is, from its appearance, and even more so from its taste.

In one of the photos, our table, with an order amount of 950 UAH + 100 karaoke (not counting the plate of appetizer, which was already taken away).

For the Owner. I am sure that you are still paying rent, since you launched recently. But people will not return to you. This is not the right position in building a business when you make a weak menu and a maximum price. Come to your senses before you go broke.

Our position, this was the first and last time we visited you. We won‚Äôt come ourselves, but we‚Äôll give it to our friends as anti-advertising. But we are sure that the rest of the guests will have the same attitude. And accordingly, loss of a guest = loss of profit.

I'll start with the good. We rested on August 24 with a friend. As for the service, everything was at the highest level, the girl in a white blouse (sorry that I didn‚Äôt recognize the name) immediately made a great impression about the establishment, she paid maximum attention to each guest!)
And as for the bad things, after which I have no desire to return here at all. Prices for songs... 100 UAH song? For what? Sorry, but this is not the level of the establishment where you can set such inflated prices. The ‚ÄúDJ‚Äù himself was already clearly on fumes.
Regarding the menu.. If you say that a mojito is made with mineral water, then it should be made with MINERAL water, and not with SCHWEEPSE. What kind of improvisation is this without the consent of the guest??? Once again, many thanks to the girl who served us, we discussed this situation with her as loyally as possible.

for our small company it‚Äôs like a ‚Äúsecond home‚Äùüè° There are few places where you can find such a warm, sincere and pleasant atmosphere as in Smile Karaoke. Of course, the first visit to your hospitable karaoke will be remembered for a long time... It was fun, interesting and kindly pleasant‚ù§Ô∏è Special thanks to your team for the endless positivity in any situation, for the excellent mood, for the modern repertoire for every taste and of course for the dance music pauses that add their own flavorüôèüèª I adore youü§óthank you for existingüôèüèª

The only karaoke at the beginning of the weekend, but apparently not for me. There was not a single song from my repertoire, even though I sang songs until I was 19. Surprised and upset. They can‚Äôt download a song there, they can‚Äôt connect their phone with a minus eitherüò≠ I sang all these songs in other karaoke a couple of years ago. I sincerely don't understand. It's a pity.
I went to another place...
But other people are fine, they have their own contingent.

Until yesterday, I could say that Troyeshchyna is a super establishment, but after yesterday, unfortunately, the rating dropped to ‚Äú0‚Äù. Why inform on all social networks that there will be a boxing broadcast, and in the end, squeeze 120 UAH and pretend that the TV turned off.

And when a full hall asks for boxing, the staff stupidly walks around pretending that nothing happened. We invited friends, told us how cool it was, and you took it and for 120 UAH you just buried yourself.....üëé
